full_title: Brown and Proud by Lighter Shade of Brown
name: Brown and Proud
name_with_artist: Brown and Proud (artist: Lighter Shade of Brown)

song.artist_names: Lighter Shade of Brown (Ft. Chulo & Fabe Love)
song.full_title: Brown & Proud by Lighter Shade of Brown (Ft. Chulo & Fabe Love)
song.title: Brown & Proud
song.lyrics:
Brown & Proud Lyrics[Verse 1: ODM]
Proud of the brown, that's what we should be
Above them all is what we could be
Straighten the problems of all of society
All the homies in the pen, that's what we don't try to be
More complete, believes in one own mind
This is the Lighter Shade and it's our time
Instead of our downfall, it's time to uplift
We got our chance cause our manager Cliff
Fulfilled a team for us to be known
I grabbed the microphone
For any maricón that tries to step up and set aside the prop
Those are the words that should run and hide
Cause that ain't just crazy, it's all about raising
The flag, that keeps us racing
To all societies, I'm voicing it loud
Cause I'm brown and proud
Hey yo T, why don't you rock this shit, man
Give him the microphone

[Verse 2: DTTX]
Brown and proud, that's what I am
So let me express myself in this jam
No shame to my name or the color of my skin
So call me a minority cause that ain't even in
I stand tall for the red, white, and the green
Know what I mean, you don't check hear to seen
I'm brown and gifted, raised and up lifted
Live on the brown side, that's how I'm living
Talk to these punks and never go soft
And doesn't want to put down just to step off
I'm an Aztec that won't be took under
All of the homies are too so take cover
Why don't we sit and talk about our color
Jumping out of place and lose respect for the other
I said it before and I'll say it out loud
Dude, I'm brown and proud

Yo Fabe Love, come off them tables and rock this table homie

[Verse: Fabe Love]
Brown and proud, so I'm saying it loud
A Mexicano here to throw down
Lyrics and música para mi gente
Yo, it's time for something diferente
Latinos, I know you're with this
So raise your hands and pump them fists
Cause it's our turn to come up
Rock the crowd and so whoa what's up
Chicano, power to strong to fade
It's the decade for a Lighter Shade
Suckers distance, take a listen
To a [?] that caught your attention
We call it Spanglish
A bit of Spanish combined with English
So remember the F, the A, the B, the E, the L, the O, the V-E
And saying it loud, you want to know why
Cause I'm brown and proud
You might also likeYo Chulo, why don't you step on to the mic and let them know how you feel

[Verse 4: Chulo]
I'm a Mexicano and proud and I'll express my molecule
I'm being very serious and don't need to be ridiculed
Increase the positivity and not what's wrong
Let's unite the fight for what's right and be strong
Always straight up, I never allow disrespect
I'm tired of people putting down and trying to neglect
My nationality and/or my formality
Is everything I talk about is factually
Ojame, porque debemos de juntandos
Que termine la violencia y vivir como hermanos
Think of the people in the past who fought
To gain equality and more open doors that they have brought
So what comes up and goes, set your mind to whatever you got to do
You must have patience cause patience is a virtue
I speaking out load and I'm moving the crowd
The notorious Chulo and I'm brown and proud

Yo, this is for all the Hispanics out there
Always think positive and do the brown thing

[ODM]
Aye yo. What's up. This is the O to the D to the M
I like to say peace to all the crazy vatos out there
[DTTX]
And this is the D, double T-X and we came to correct our mistakes that was talked about the brown race

[Fade Love]
Yo, this is DJ Fade Love and I like to say what's up to all my hente. Be brown and proud for the 90s and we out of here

Paz, paz, paz...Embed

song.full_title: El Varrio by Lighter Shade of Brown
song.title: El Varrio

song.full_title: Spill The Wine by Lighter Shade of Brown
song.title: Spill The Wine
song.lyrics:
Spill The Wine Lyrics[Introduction Chorus]
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl

[Verse 1: ODM]
It was twelve o'clock when the lunch bell rang
It's time for escuela waiting for Fabe to bring
Two 8-balls, some chicharrónes and some chicle
Y otra cosa mas para diserté
In the parking lot sipping down on oldies
(They're going to smell it on you, O) That's what they told me
I didn't worry at all cause I had gym class next
This situation I was in yo, it was so complex
Gym time was over and I was off to class
I better not be late, otherwise I need a pass
I got to the end of the hall, there I spotted my principal
Beer on my breathe and it was convincible
He stopped me on my track and said, "Son, your mine
Before you spend some time, you better spill that wine"
[Chorus]
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
8-ball junkie

[Verse 2: DTTX]
I remember the time when I spilled my wine
I was mad cause yo, I had to pay for mine
It all started when we called a couple of brownies
Nos invitaron a su casa but yo, they live in Downey
Hopped in the car and started pumping the bass
It took us an hour before we had got to their place
They said their parents weren't coming home until about one
So we popped out the brew and we started to have some fun
To kill the time, we played a game called "Pass Out"
Parents came and yo, we was assed out
Father came up and bum rushed the show
Started screaming and yelling saying that we had to go
Then he lifted the girls and said, "What's up"
I can see by your faces that you're all-
Still screaming and yelling, he said these lines
I had spill your brew but man spilled my wine

[Chorus]
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
You might also likeI'm, I'm drunk, I'm, I'm, I'm drunk (Beautiful, I'm drunk)
I'm, I'm drunk, I'm, I'm, I'm drunk (So what, I'm drunk)

[Verse 3: ODM & DTTX]
We left the house and got out in a hurry
Back on the streets but it was still early
When to the liquor store to get some more forty's
Fabe turned around and said, "Nah, that's it for me"
We said cool, brought more brew
Broke out like runaways and headed for the freeway

In his rear-view mirror, Fabe spotted a one-time
Then in, right there, when that ended our fun time
Cops pulled us over and asked for Fabe's license
Took it out and in the processes, dropped five cents
Smelled the alcohol, gave him the test
And all Fabe said, "I know if you wise against the law"
Passed the test and everything went fine
Except for one thing, he made us spill the wine

[Chorus]
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine, dig that girl
Spill the wine...Embed

song.full_title: Pancho Villa by Lighter Shade of Brown
song.title: Pancho Villa
song.lyrics:
Pancho Villa Lyrics[Introduction Dialogue: ODM]
Oh yeah
Another dope track by DJ Jammin' James
Yo, I’m about to bust this one for all the homies out there
Some knowledge or should I say history
Yo, this one is about Pancho Villa
A real veterano back in the old days
Yo, check it out

[Verse 1: ODM]
The revolutionist, Pancho Villa himself
Smooth Mexican vato known for robbing the wealth
Tough Hispanic bandit general in his own time
Whatever came about, he was always down for the crime
Slanging his way, he left bodies laying
In his town, he didn't mess around, no time to be playing
He was a crazy outlaw, robbing trains was just a hobby
Looting banks, raiding on mines, no one can top the
Original thought, he had the U.S.A. after him
No one can pull the damn smooth Mexican
Vicious, they looked upon him as specious
A villain in his own mind and being a repetitious
So step aside, my people history being made
Get a glimpse so we chill while I explain this renegade
He's Pancho Villa, Pancho Villa, Pancho Villa
[Verse 2: ODM]
Also hero, killer of many
Back up was never needed, by himself, he was plenty
He was born and raised, went through the faze of a villain
Stealing, dealing, and he was captured for the killing
Of sixteen Americans dead on arrival
He went to court, faced on a massacre trial
Sentenced to jail, he made bail, escape in Texas
He’s Hispanic, they forgot so knew they couldn't catch this
Fast pacing artist finding a body filling, the vato was a ruthless
Half his name spells villain
He became a big part of the party revolution
Shaken, taking him out but like juice and
Grown up to be a rebel in the city of Chihuahua
A legend, hey yo, palabra, Pancho Villa, Pancho Villa, Pancho Villa

[Verse 3: ODM]
Pancho joined a man named
The man could swing a gun like hands on a piano
He led him to where Madero was assassinated
Well, it was more like cremated
Popularity struck, Villa was honored in his town
Coming home proud and on his face was a frown
Had to summon all up, the job was all done
And in Mexico, he was known as number one
He's Pancho Villa, Pancho Villa, Pancho Villa
You might also like[Outro Dialogue: ODM]
Yeah, just a little message to all my gente out there
Little bit of knowledge kicked to you
Yo, peaceEmbed

song.artist_names: Lighter Shade of Brown (Ft. King Ed)
song.full_title: T.J. Nights by Lighter Shade of Brown (Ft. King Ed)
song.title: T.J. Nights
song.lyrics:
T.J. Nights Lyrics[Verse 1: DTTX]
Me and the crew, we hopped on the freeway
Donde vamos a ir para T.J
Rolling along on a hot summer night
The luna was full and star shine so bright
Pumping the bass to some dope tunes
Breeze in our face and the wind felt so cool
Right about then, all me dijo disco
Where the people jamming, swinging was the place we had to go to
He said that the place was real hip
Where they cruised and the crowd just kicked
I couldn't wait so I looked at my watch
If I had one wish, I wish time would stop
Took the 215 to the border
Stopped at Mick D's, placed an order
Got to the border line, saw the city lights
King Ed kicked the chorus to T.J. nights
[Chorus: King Ed]
T.J. nights
T.J. nights
With a Lighter Shade of Brown
Getting down

[Verse 2: ODM & DTTX]
Clean, fresh dressed and looking smooth
A Lighter Shade of Brown, yeah we're ready to groove
Hopped in the carro, headed for Club-O
We didn't have much time, got there on the double
Into the lot which was all filled up
Chicas in the lado saying what's up
No time to waste, no time for chit-chat
Hurried up quickly and parked in the back

Parrando in line, we was waiting to pay a fee
At the puerta, got frisked by security
Walked inside, place was real packed
Sentado like players, we ain't the
I'm scoping out the nalga of a brownie
Smooth with sex appeal, a tender-rooni
I stepped to her quickly, as quick as a play
Popped a chicle in my mouth so my breath wouldn't stink
She said her name was Maria, I cope, bought her a cerveza
Well then now what would happen, she was chilling in my mesa
Back in the room was DJ Fade
Just taxing the back of a Latin babe
O is at the bar just sipping on a shooter
Saw some fly girl and thought he pull her
Her novio came up trying to cause conflict
O through a right cross, that was the end of it
Right about then, bouncers through a bum rush
Started to get rowdy and then dissed us
Hopped in the car, left the sight
But there's still another sequel to our T.J. nights
You might also like[Chorus: King Ed]
T.J. nights
T.J. nights
With a Lighter Shade of Brown
Getting down

[Verse 3: ODM]
We was up to the linea in a flash
All out of energy, all out of cash
We traveled two miles before we hit the fursan
The U.S.A, miles ahead nine
Solely but surely we had arrived
After a night at Club-O, we were lucky to be alive
Different hente coming up to our window
Man, crossing the border is like crossing the rainbow
Almost to the front, three o'clock in the morn
Won't get home until the break of dawn
Took a long while but we finally got there
The man at the window was not being fair
Told us to pull aside and open the back
But we was citizens, ain't going out like that
Fade stepped on the gas
Right about then, a federale on the tip
Way ahead of them, they was way behind
Lost the federales in a matter of time
The night was blast, of course putting up a fight
And that's the way it was on a T.J. night
[Chorus: King Ed]
T.J. nightsEmbed

song.artist_names: Lighter Shade of Brown (Ft. Huggy Boy & Shiro Stokes)
song.full_title: On a Sunday Afternoon by Lighter Shade of Brown (Ft. Huggy Boy & Shiro Stokes)
song.title: On a Sunday Afternoon
song.title_with_featured: On a Sunday Afternoon (Ft. Huggy Boy & Shiro Stokes)
song.lyrics:
On a Sunday Afternoon Lyrics[Intro: Dialogue]
Hi this is Huggy Boy
This is going out to all the homies on a Sunday afternoon

[Verse 1: DTTX]
Sittin in the park on a Sunday afternoon
Me and the crew just jammin the oldy tune
Sipping on a cold bottle of brewsky
Gave O' a swig he passed it back to me
Right about then up came some of the homies
Mike, Elia P, J Smooth, Phil and Larry
Bustin out the ice chest, Phil popped the cooler
Elia P drunk brew nothing better to do
Mike his cup yo is filled with bird
J Smooth had a cold glass to you know it word
Girls at the place just preparing the food
The sky was clear and the weather was cool
Kids at the playground playing on the merry go round
All the cars cruisin bumpin their funky sound
Cause it's Sunday last day for a funday
Back to business as usual come Monday
At the park everything went real smooth...
On a Sunday afternoon
[Chorus: Shiro Stokes]
We were chillin at the park
Just waiting for the sun to go down
It was me Shiro and the homies
A Lighter Shade of Brown (On a Sunday afternoon)

[Verse 2: ODM]
I said chill (chill)
All the vatos in the park stay ill (ill)
Playing horseshoes to win the bill (bill)
Carne Asada slappin on the grill (grill)
So now we eat
The cops cruise by looking for the booze
But what Ruben had was plainly simply apple juice
Coming up short just like a fool
Went back to his car with nothing he could do
All the cars in the parking lot low profiling
And everywhere you look you see somebody styling
Cars with lifts rolling deep with booming sounds
Its a good time to cruise around
In the parking lot where the brownie was stacking
And all the vatos are looking for some action yeah

[Chorus: Shiro Stokes]
We were chillin at the park
Just waiting for the sun to go down
It was me Shiro and the homies
A Lighter Shade of Brown (On a Sunday afternoon)
You might also like[Verse 2: DTTX & ODM]
Well the sun was set and it began to get dark
And we were getting ready to leave the park
We had a good time (ahh yeah)
Yeah we had a good day
Pack the stuff off and we was on our way
Yo mackin the brownies as we all cut em off at the pass
But the all actin soft as we pulled up
They was actin all shy to us
But eses, yo wanna know who's the flyest
We found out and Jimmy hats were passed out
Una esta fea so hey yo Peps, you jacked out
Coming up short they gave us no run
So yo homies consider this a dry one
Time to cruise the boulevard, time to have
I'm guaranteed to find a brownie while the night is young
We were rolling, yeah looking real smooth
Cause cruising Whittier is how we ended our afternoon

[Outro Chorus: Shiro Stokes]
Smooth chillin, just kickin it
With the top down, down to the ground
I know they be watching me smooth chilliing
Just kickin it with the top down, down to the ground
I pump it up for you...smooth
Smmooooooth just chillin on a Sunday afternoon4Embed

song.full_title: Bouncin' by Lighter Shade of Brown

song.artist_names: Lighter Shade of Brown (Ft. Shiro Stokes & Teardrop)
song.full_title: Latin Activity by Lighter Shade of Brown (Ft. Shiro Stokes & Teardrop)
song.title: Latin Activity
song.lyrics:
Latin Activity Lyrics[Intro: Shiro Stokes]
When your body gets this feeling and you don't know what it is
Got you moving, got you grooving, got you rapping with the pill
And you know that you were grooving aause you feel it in your soul
When the Latin turns us flowing cause the power takes control

[Chorus: Shiro Stokes]
It's that Latin... activity (Ohh)
Lets Jam Lets Jam (Latin Activity)

[Verse 1: DTTX]
Roll the track, step back and let me activate
A lighter sound provided by Jammin' James
On a flex, guess what's coming next
A dope rhyme by the D, double T-X
On the mic to engage in a row
Pump the grounds and will act like an active flow
Just for you and your crew so you can taste
The rhythm from this active Latin race
As it takes control of your body and soul
Feel the physical change and you'll be sold
You can't stop what start to take place
Your body starts to groove to the digital base
That's what happens as you can see
Now let the crew explain the Latin activity
[Chorus: Shiro Stokes]
Latin activity
It's that Latin... activity (Ohh)
Lets Jam Lets Jam (Latin Activity)

[Verse 2: Tear drop]
Tear drop put the others in a sickness
A Latin female dope to get witness
Hype after track with a lyrical concept
A brown queen known to break it down in one step
So legit, the microphone just pass it
Right to me, the one that's chosen to grasp it
Just drop the mic that you were holding
Cause if a Lighter Shade of Brown is how I'm rolling
Latina, taking over the microphone and rocking the place
With a little bit of soul and treble of bass
As I rock, hip-hop, non-stop and make you dance
And have a question are you still in the trance?
En inglés o español come quieran el ritmo
Mueven sus pies y bailen al ritmo
Hacemos bailar es mi misión
Y Latín active es la canción

[Chorus: Shiro Stokes]
Latin activity
It's that Latin... activity (Ohh)
Lets Jam Lets Jam (Latin Activity)
You might also like[Verse 3: ODM]
I get Latin active when I grab my microphone
Brownies on my tip begging me to come home
I know they want more screaming from an encore
Fellas get jealous so they try to ignore
The O, to the D, to the M-I-M
We rock the lyrics and before you know it, bam
We got you dancing to our song
With the Lighter Shade of Brown, well hey its on
Once again my friend, you got to have this soul
Get on the dance floor and lose control
When I lose control I get sort of active
My mind starts banging in the form of Latin
Yo tengo derecho de ser una estrella
Porque mi rimas son marivellas
I'm a one dope Latino, mi languaje más fino
Porque soy Latino activo

[Chorus: Shiro Stokes]
Latin activity
It's that Latin... activity (Ohh)
Lets Jam Lets Jam (Latin Activity)

Latin, Latin Ohhh... ohhhEmbed
